text:
@ryanobles @Yamiche @CNN @realDonaldTrump What is there to praise?

The US is number one in #COVID19 cases?

That he allowed it to spread over 1million+ Americans?

That he failed with shortages in PPE’s , ventilators and testing??

Great Job!
#sarcasm
